General.Name: Forcecon Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Forcecon Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of thermal management products in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers DC axial and blower fans, thermal module active and passive products, vapor chambers, and heat pipes for use in computers, VGA, LED lightings, servers, automobiles, smart-phones, and bio-technology science fields. It serves ODM and OEM customers. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Zhubei, Taiwan.
